
The material class represents a source of renderable information which can be used in functions such as [[/dxDrawImage.md|dxDrawImage]], [[/dxDrawImageSection.md|dxDrawImageSection]] and [[/dxDrawMaterialSectionLine3D.md|dxDrawMaterialSectionLine3D]].

Elements which are materials:
*[[/Texture.md|Texture]]
*[[/Shader.md|Shader]]
